channel.title: 704 Client Login Help
channel.description:
I have the Optimus 704 Client.
When you go to log in, it has the Real Runescape Login Screen, with the "Connect to Facebook" logo and the "Create account here" stuff.
How can I take that off and just leave the "Username" and "Password" and "Login" boxes?
[img]http://i.imgur.com/hwcei.png[/img]

item.title: 704 Client Login Help
item.dc:creator: @sinisoul sini
item.description:
@sinisoul wrote:

Is this an actual 704 client or just a 317 client with the newer widgets?

Read full topic
